BOOLEAN SimGetInkeyOptions::ActivateYesNo (   )  const [inline]
 

bit 3: 0 = character sets defined by bit 1 and bit 2 are enabled | 1 = character sets defined by bit 1 and bit 2 are disabled and the "Yes/No" response is requested
